properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 11:45AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Mississippi
River...Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Monday February 10 until further notice.
* At 10 AM Monday the stage was 13.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 21.7 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Monday February 10 and
continue to rise to near 21.7 feet by Tuesday February 11.
* At 23.0 feet...Bigbee Road just west of the river will flood.
Access to several homes will be restricted. Large area of farm land
will flood west of the river.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
